raw_body: Rev. Fr. QUENTIN PERERA – Rest In Peace. 30-04-1938 – 21-12-2023. It is with profound sadness that we inform you the demise of Rev. Fr. QUENTIN PERERA. His mortal remains will lie in state at Our Lady of Fatima Church,​ Malkaduwawa from 9.00 a.m. on Friday 22nd December 2023. The funeral arrangements are as follows: Requiem Mass will be at 2.30 p.m. on Saturday,​ 23rd of December 2023 followed by the funeral service. Burial will take place at Malkaduwawa Cemetery. Fr. Piyal Janaka Fernando,​ Vicar General – Catholic Diocese of Kurunegala.084400
